contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Qatar Green Building Council Attends Expo Milano 2015

childMarkdownRemark.html:
As part of the State of Qatar’s Pavilion at Expo Milano 2015, Qatar Green Building Council (QGBC) showcased the achievements Qatar’s sustainability and green building sector has made in recent years.

Providing a unique platform for the exchange of creative ideas, Expo Milano was attended by representatives from over 140 countries to exhibit the best of their technologies offering sustainable solutions to an array of social and environmental issues.

In order to help visitors, especially families and children, gain a virtual experience of sustainable living and green buildings in Qatar, an innovative sustainability edutainment tool developed by QGBC’s research team was showcased at the exhibition.
QGBC’s team attending the Expo conducted an informative presentation on the State of Qatar’s efforts in regard to further enhancing the state of sustainability and green buildings in the country.

For the full story, please click here.
